amendment.description: To state the policy of the United States on cooperation in the Indo-Pacific region.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1883 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1883 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Romney to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4185) To state the policy of the United States on cooperation in the Indo-Pacific region.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1883 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1883 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Romney to Amendment SA 2301.
